website_summaries.verdict: Microsoft continues to improve upon the critically acclaimed Surface Pro, and its stunning display and blazingly fast processor place the 6th-generation high above the competition.
pros: Swap between tablet, studio, and laptop modes
cons: The best Windows tablet on the market comes with a hefty price tag

customer_reviews.title: Not a Windows 10 Pro OS...
customer_reviews.text: According to the information given this was supposed to be a Windows 10 Pro OS. Well it does not come with Windows Pro OS like my previous Surface Pro, but Windows 10 Home. If you click the link to the store they want to charge you another $99. Microsoft rip off as usual!! Also better have a fast internet with unlimited data because this does not come with the 1809 feature update to Windows either! Typical Microsoft and their bloatware!!
customer_reviews.author: The Rabbi Bishop MRBowman

customer_reviews.title: Aswesome surface pro 6
customer_reviews.text: Awesome machine for designers photoshop illustrator and XD work amazing, i could install and play rather smoothly Xcom enemy unknown. The screen is super crisp and has a lot of contrast, the touch feature works okay but could be better. The battery last almost a whole work day You can either use the microsoft keyboard which gets dirty super fast or get a bluetooth keyboard/touchpad The pen works awesome in photoshop The Microsoft surface pro 6 has the benneffit of using a complete operating system against the ipad which you can do a lot less with
customer_reviews.author: Sergio David Contreras Frayre

customer_reviews.title: promotion with type cover and it came without a type cover!
customer_reviews.text: This was a special promotion just before christmas that included a type cover so I bought a pen separately and now it came without a type cover!!! Really... I bought it for my wife as a christmas gift and wrapped it immediately...thinking that it will be in the box with the surface pro, well it was not!!
customer_reviews.author: Nico D.

customer_reviews.title: This product is AMAZing!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the mixed and confusing reviews for the product I was seriously hesitating on taking this offer. Eventually decided to give it a go as I could return it in the worst case. And I'm glad I purchased it as it came all in perfectly sealed factory box with the type cover inside. All the specs are in line with the item description. See the pictures for easy reference.
customer_reviews.author: elvinitto

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: First it arrived Christmas Eve, 3 days before promised! Next I was able to successfully set it up! And the Surface talks to the keyboard! I bought one from Best Buy that only spoke Spanish and the replacement wouldn’t talk to the keyboard! Returned for a refund to Best Buy and I couldn’t be happier with this one from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Debb

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the extra cost
customer_reviews.text: I use this for research, writing, some Netflix/Prime Video, and backup to a work computer with Office apps. This was an upgrade for me over an Acer tablet also running Win10. Amazed. It does everything I ask it to and quickly. Screen and trackpad are easy and bugless to navigate. Some bloatware, but it can be deleted. Battery is amazing. Cameras on it are like midrange cellphone good. Speakers are not bad at all for their size, not tinny. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: zltmn

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Not what it’s advertised
customer_reviews.text: I could not load any of the software needed for my work. Windows defender kept stating this could harm your computer and blocked it. What’s interesting I have a Surface Pro 3. No problem running on that one. Also Microsoft soft states Windows Surface Pro . But is comes with Home not Pro. That’s a 99.95 upgrade. My Surface Pro 3 came with Pro .
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: It's wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I've owned the original Pro (not great) the Pro4 and now the Pro6. If you have a Pro 4 then it's probably not really worth upgrading since they STILL did not add USB-C even though the 6 has the newer CPU and a few minor updates. I did only because I gave my Pro4 to my wife. I use these for presentations and they are GREAT for overseas travel and layovers. The stand is good and they are plenty powerful for beyond basics. Remember these are full pc's so of course they are not going to get the battery life of a tablet but the gain in the 6 is good.
customer_reviews.author: JAP73

customer_reviews.title: Goodness!
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few tablets and this is probably my favorite one. It's very versatile and not only that, I feel that I don't even need to keep my phone on my person when I'm at home. Though, if I can somehow receive text messages to my tablet from my phone that'd be even better. Not necessary, but better. I mainly bought it because I wanted to get back into drawing and work with art digitally but the pen would have to be a separate purchase for another time. Other than that, this is amazing especially if you like to take your work with you. It's thin enough to fit in your bag!
customer_reviews.author: Kent

customer_reviews.title: Just what I'd hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: I've used the Surface Pro 6 for a few months now and I love it. Battery life is spectacular. It is light enough to carry through the airport with the keyboard still the right size to actually tye versus tablet. I did have a bit of a time getting a bridge to connect to so as to have multiple USB ports, HDMI, etc. I did find one for about $40 and it came with a USB-C. I got a simple USB-C to USB-A adapter (2 for $7 from Amazon) and I'm all set.
customer_reviews.author: ChefSparky

customer_reviews.title: Came with wrong color keyboard-- otherwise I love it
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for school mostly. I was already borrowing another surface pro 6 from my dad and I liked it so much I bought my own. I love the versatility, the battery life and the performance. The i5 is lightning fast for the things I use it for (document editing, online shopping, stardew valley) and the battery life is truly impressive as well. I ordered a black keyboard cover to go with it and it came in a light grey instead-- not really mad though cause it still looks absolutely stunning. Would recommend for the college student who needs to work on the go often. I also have a surface pen and it works wonders with this laptop!
customer_reviews.author: elitewaffle

customer_reviews.title: My Wife Loves This Thing
customer_reviews.text: Wow, is this laptop small and light. Very state-of-the-art. Previously, she was using a gaming laptop. She doesn't game. However, gaming laptops tend to be very fast. This device is a lot smaller and lighter than her old laptop. She loves it. Note that the screen is excellent. However, the pen is something of a letdown. We thought it would be a complete replacement for a mouse. Not so as it turns out. Note that this machine is more than fast enough and very reliable (hardware and software). It you can afford it, this is a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Schaeffer

customer_reviews.title: KEYBOARD IS TRASH
customer_reviews.text: Touch screen lags ALOT. The keyboard is broken the connecting part to the screen is loose and detached from the keyboard and gets stuck in the screen. It broke the keyboard sensor. Never buying electronics from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Newest Surface Pro 6 at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what happened with some other recent reviewers--maybe competing sellers? The cplain abouy getting an old version but I had no such issue. I ordered the silver Surface Pro 6 with black type cover (128GB storage) and that was exactly what I received (NKR-00001), new in box with latest-gen Core i5
customer_reviews.author: Nick D.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic machine!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast. Way more than I need for what I bought it for. I love it. I will probably never buy a laptop again. I use photoshop elements for light editing and resizing and it handles it great. I use it for displaying my reference photos when I draw and it does more than I need. Great screen. I like the touch sensitivity and might get the add on pen from Microsoft to up its game. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This Surface device is perfect for the on-the-go power users. If you need a powerful but lightweight laptop. This device would be prefect for you. Only drawback might be the level of comfort for use on your lap, the device was more or less made for desk use, however if you get a case it can make the lap use more comfortable. Other than that, you get the power of a laptop but portability of a tablet. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Great portability, Can use it for 90-95% of what I do on my main computer.
customer_reviews.text: Love the Surface, I have had the Surface Pro 3 (which now my wife uses) and I now have the Surface Pro 6 about 2 weeks and I have nothing negative to say about it. It does what I what I need/wanted and expected it to do. I even like the I5 chip in it. I got it with a 256GB SSDI and added another 256GB mini-flash drive, so I have plenty of room for my OS and apps.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Bob

customer_reviews.title: charger stopped working in less than one year
customer_reviews.text: i always don’t like to put a bad review about anything, however when i pay this much money to get a great laptop or tablet, but i find that i wasted my money i feel so bad. i bought my surface pro in January2019 and now the charger doesn’t work anymore. so in less than one year i need to replace the charger which means there is some cheating and buying this product is a waste of money! i don’t recommend anybody to buy it. just because i can’t accept the truth of paying this much money and getting stuck at the middle of using it because of charger problem
customer_reviews.author: yusra

customer_reviews.title: Daughter's college laptop, perfect
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter wanted something lighter and thinner than her lenovo, so we got her a Surface Pro for her first year of college. She loves the Surface, it fits in all her bags, it's light, it's plenty capable for what she does as a Math/Spanish major. We bought the 6 instead of the 7 because it has a standard USB port and all her peripherals hae that style. The 7 has USB-C and would need her to carry an adaptor all the time to plug in her peripherals. She is very happy with her Surface Pro 6 and I'm going to buy one for my wife too in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Keith K.

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet but remember its not an ios or android its windows
customer_reviews.text: I like the surface pro a lot but I can't say I'm loving it. There are not a lot of apps for the surface pro that you might be used to having with your ios or android tablets. I knew it would not have the apps I am used to, I just didn't take that into account when I bought it. So if you like the convenience of the apps that come with ios or android then this is not the tablet for you. Also if you do not like windows 10 then this is not the tablet for you either. Personally I like windows 10 and I am really enjoying the surface pro.
customer_reviews.author: Bill D

customer_reviews.title: Received faulty device with a known issue many have had.
customer_reviews.text: Always been a surface pro fan, however 2 weeks after receiving and minimal use, I began to see screen flickering at the top 2 inches. After researching problem and attempting all troubleshooting from Microsoft, it could not be fixed and was a hardware problem. Returning on the last available day and will probably not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rodger

customer_reviews.title: Best Tablet Out There
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my Asus with this one. Wow. Super fast, ergonomically brilliant, great display, and one of best keyboards I've used. I type close to 90 words per minute and rely on comfortable, responsive keyboards. While the keyboard is an add-on, I think it is one of the best qualities of the Surface. The way it folds up and detaches/reattaches is outstanding. The unit folds up to a wafer-thin and lightweight package. I just carted it all over Greece for two weeks, in a small daypack. Well worth the cost!
customer_reviews.author: NPR Guy

customer_reviews.title: TOP SPECS
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small versatile laptop/tablet for work. This model has great specs good memory and everything contained in a small unit, perfect for travel purposes and with enough power to be on the road and to work with high-end programs such as AutoCAD, not great for games because of the video card so this not definitely for gamming. Overall I am super happy with the product. Overall, fast, reliable, enough power and great screen resolution, you can sync phone, get smart password face recognition software and no lag what so ever on multiple open programs at the same time. Hope it helps finding the product you need.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY PICTURE
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something to use for doing any additional work at the home and use it as a tablet when I'm not sitting at the desk. Works great. No issues on battery life. Keyboard is okay. Would've liked more ports to plug in mouse/external at same time.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Anthony Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Best computer EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Best computer EVER! I now have three of these and love them all!! One for me for work, one for my Administrative Assistant and one for my lovely wife, who is an artist. These machines are simply excellent quality, powerful and robust!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Behm Jr

customer_reviews.title: Was expecting Windows 10 Pro, not 10 Home
customer_reviews.text: When you spend this much on a surface "pro" and the operating system simply says "Windows 10" I would not have expected it to ship with Windows 10 Home on the device. I purchase this for work and need the buiult in encryption features in Pro. I will now have to aqcuire a version of the PRO OS to install on thsi computer adding time and money. The exterior shipping box was all banged up as well. The interior Surface Pro box seemed in good condition so far. Product appears undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: DIAL/SELF

customer_reviews.title: Good computer, Bad battery
customer_reviews.text: Although I really like the Surface 6, I have a big problem with battery life. It seems to only have about a 4-6 hour life. I would be afraid to take out to a client if I expected to be there very long. At home, where I use it most of the time, I usually let it fully charge, then I work off the battery. The instructions say it isn't good to keep it plugged in all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Malvern Lusky

customer_reviews.title: Decent for simple, mobile video editing
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations. It's great for casual computing as well as doing that extra bit more. I've done video editing and animation with it and, while it wasn't hardcore editing, it was smooth. Great for being able to do some initial editing during filming and prepping for the main edit on the desktop later. Looking forward to getting more acquainted with the tablet and making this a part of the arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: zewkin

customer_reviews.title: Great for School or Personal
customer_reviews.text: I am going back to school and needed a new laptop that wasn't outdated. I was really looking for something that I can use for school and personal use. I thought a tablet would be great. I absolutely love this tablet/keyboard combo. Light weight so it's easy travel for school and I love that it also syncs with my iPhone. Also you really cannot beat the price for the computer AND keyboard. I looked in store at this specific tablet and keyboard;it would have cost me $200 over what I paid here to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Allsup

customer_reviews.title: Battery charging port started burning up and charger was burnt.
customer_reviews.text: Battery charging port started burning and the charger was burnt. Huge problem, could’ve burned down my house. Buyers beware!!! Sent in and had to settle with a refurbished device. Pathetic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Just wish there were more ports.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for work and light enough to carry around. Only downside is there are very little ports so just know you may need to purchase a docking station if you need to connect more than one item. I have a head set connected, another monitor and a wireless key board so I needed a lot more ports than it had. But I already knew that when I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Arline

customer_reviews.title: Defective products that I bought for my wife birthday
customer_reviews.text: It is always a pain when you get a defective product but it is much worst when it is for your wife's birthday. The surface pro I bought had an issue either with battery or with the power key. I could not turn that on when it was not plunged in. The Amazon provides a good service for returning the product though. I would not recommend baying any Microsoft products and I think they better focus on the windows that they are expert in.
customer_reviews.author: Ehsan Dehghan Niri

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: WiFi is a serious issue. How do you spend almost $1k on a computer and the wifi doesn't work out of the box?! Ridiculous. UPDATE: Contacted Microsoft and they indicated that both computers sold to me were previously purchased in May. I just received them in July. He said it was pretty suspicious to get 2 SurfacePro 6 with WiFi and blue screen/RAM issues out of the box. Contacted Amazon for assistance with refund. I will have to wait 2 weeks for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves to take her Surface Pro 6 to her college classes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for hand drawing notes during class - she's a medical student and needs to draw lots of diagrams. Battery life is great and the size is perfect. She threw out her HP laptop after this.
customer_reviews.author: Just some average guy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice laptop type computer.
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent and my son talked it up before I purchased it. He uses his much more than I do but I found it to be exactly as he described and it is a very good quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Richard McDougall

customer_reviews.title: very poor response to defective product
customer_reviews.text: Received this device and it worked for approximately a month. Then it turned into a brick. Followed the instructions for return, mailed the device in, and heard NOTHING. Did not get a refund, acknowledgment of the return, nothing. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Barton

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses this for video ASL interpreting. The camera and screen quality is excellent. Battery life is great and the device is very portable. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! Best of it's kind
customer_reviews.text: A true tablet to replace your laptop. Great performance, great format, great accesories. The whole package is pricey though (surface + pen + typecover). Yet if you value design, mobility and performance, you'll love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Vigneaux

customer_reviews.title: Not bad of a device
customer_reviews.text: i love everything about this device. It does everything I want to taking notes, and even with the pen helps so much with multitasking. The device last as it has described and I have no complains about that. It's easy to use and the best item for school. The only down side I wish I had in my package was that I received a grey keyboard instead of a black one which shows in the picture of a black keyboard no other color. Other than that I love this device. No more using paper ever again!
customer_reviews.author: Vijay

customer_reviews.title: What a great device!!
customer_reviews.text: This Surface Pro 6 works great. Easy to set up. Using it for a work/pleasure application and it operates quickly. I had a Logitech Bluetooth mouse that hooked up very easily. So much better that the old VIAO laptop I was using. Fast, very vivid screen. So far great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Such a great Product!
customer_reviews.text: If you are here to decide whether to buy a surface or no, don't hesitate. i thru my laptop away and have been using this on the go all the time and inside my house. I use it for Autocad, Photoshop, Illustrator and as a media consumption device.
customer_reviews.author: Mallouk

customer_reviews.title: Product Not as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a Surface Pro 6 with the i7 Processor, I received a Pro 6 with an i5 Processor. Product NOT AS ADVERTISED. Make sure you check your specs when you receive the item!
customer_reviews.author: Madison Fay

customer_reviews.title: Fits all of my needs
customer_reviews.text: Only had the computer for a short while. So far it fits all of my needs. It is faster than my last computer. The battery lasts as long as I need it. So, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara F.

customer_reviews.title: Works great with 1 issue
customer_reviews.text: Still giving this 5 stars, but the BT randomly crashes. I keep the Surface on 24/7 and use it for work. Randomly every 4-7 days I have to uninstall BT driver and reinstall it to get it working again. I don't think its a hardware issue, and it doesn't bother me enough to diving in and fully trouble shooting it.
customer_reviews.author: MCLafayette

customer_reviews.title: Return was easy and refund was what I paid
customer_reviews.text: I thought the surface pro was great but I made a quick decision on the purchase because of the need to work from home during COVID. The biggest part of my work is making videos that I film with my iPad. I decided that the Mac was the best for me because of airdrop. So nothing wrong with the Microsoft product just not the right fit for me. I am mostly impressed with how easy and painless the return process was.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: If you are a student, medical resident, or whtever and u want a laptop and a tablet that is heavy duty and stylish. Nothing is better than surfave pro. The battery is awesome with heavy work, screen is clear and sharp, i could open browser with 11 tabs without any single delay. Highly recommened, and one of the best devices inhave ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Murad Alahmad

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for students with the versatility and power. This surface is powerful and adapts to any situation you throw at it. The surface should be used as a second computer. If you're thinking about getting it, just do it! The only downside is a keyboard is a must, and the pen is recommended if you plan on taking notes or drawing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its a REAL MICROSOFT....
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with my surface pro6 its nicer than my pro 4 and I bought a screen saver as my old one screen cracked so I'm hoping I don't have that problem, so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal Product
customer_reviews.text: I only kind of want to dock this review one star because it's a shame the surface pro doesn't come with USB-C or TB3 ports... other than that, this is hands down a great portable and powerful device for productivity users and Microsoft has built a great dock that pairs nicely with it!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: A very good computer for graduate students. the battery lasts long. easy to install. I really love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Asmae lazaar

customer_reviews.title: Battery life not as good as expected
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my Surface 3 with this Surface 6. The battery life has not been what I expected. I play Apple Music through my home receiver while my wife uses it for cooking recipes and we’ll get maybe 5+ hours on a full charge.
customer_reviews.author: W. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome. No ragerts.
customer_reviews.text: Love this device. I mostly use it for emails, contracts, and a small bit of graphic design. It’s way faster than my Dell laptop and whatever random desktop I have. It slides easily in my messenger bag, but when I’m home it sits on my coffee table and is ready to go in literally a couple seconds. The wake time and face recognition is super fast and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing 2 in 1 laptops
customer_reviews.text: (Intel Core i7, 16GB RAM, 512 GB) good battery life and performance lightweight design full windows experience I recommend this for students fan not work always until you go for high performance fan sound is very low difficult to hear but there is low sound more than 2 week i don't have any problem... no USB c
customer_reviews.author: khalid

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop
customer_reviews.text: I've had my Surface Pro 6 for a year, and I'm very happy with it. My previous laptop was old and very slow, but this one is fast. I'm still learning some features cause I'm not a tech person, but that's on me & not the device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer TN

customer_reviews.title: wont work
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the fact that immediately after opening box, turned on Surface pro 6, started getting set up , got to where I logged on internet, screen froze and would do nothing even after plugging in to power cord. Dropped it off to IT dept at work to see if they could help. Nearly $2,000 and it wont work!!!! Will have to send back
customer_reviews.author: SHEREE DANIEL

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.text: I had 2 options available to me. Either the iPad pro or the Surface pro 6. After weeks of reading reviews on both Products I decided to go with the Surface pro. Main reason is that it has a Windows based platform that runs my manuals in an offline mode. Being based in Africa where internet is a luxury, this was the selling for me. The product far exceeded my expectations. The battery life is unbelievable, giving me more than a full day of productivity on a single charge. Coupled with the Bluetooth keyboard, it transforms into to a very capable laptop replacement.
customer_reviews.author: African Grease Monkey

customer_reviews.title: All that it's supposed to be
customer_reviews.text: Came with Windows 10 Pro, so could activate Windows. Had a time getting that fixed but customer support got me there. Unit is great, fast, very portable and all the other things my friends said it would be. Refurbished Surface Pro 6, i7, 8/256gb, refurbished mouse, keyboard and dock. Ordered another set for wife. About $2600. I am Realtor, she owns small financial service company. Get Office 365 with it, store all in cloud, enjoy max flexibility. Power deal.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Chenery

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible piece of machine. I used it with OneNote frequently and writing/sketching on this Surface Pro is incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Navin Badaltjauwdhari

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great primary computer.
customer_reviews.text: I like the portability and the screen. Getting used to the folding keyboard cover and kick stand took about a day but now I'm used to it. Haven't been able to determine true battery life but it seems like it just keeps going!
customer_reviews.author: K. Behr

customer_reviews.title: Really great tablet
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying this table. Good quality and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Great 2 in 1, but battery on our first was sketchy.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this Surface Pro 6 after our last one's ability to charge failed after 56 days of use. Hoping this one lasts longer. Definitely getting the extended warranty just in case. Other than that, my daughter loves this computer. She uses it for school, for her art and free time
customer_reviews.author: CoxFamMusic

customer_reviews.title: Hardware problems
customer_reviews.text: i have received the keyboard missing a key I dont live in USA, and i could not find a Microsoft store neither in South America nor in Europe to the the missing key or to change the keyboard I am not returning to USA till november After two months of use, the keyboard have released form the screen, and the screen has broken even i have put a protection glass this is my experience with Surface
customer_reviews.author: Edgard P.

customer_reviews.title: Surface Pro 6-Great $$; Fast, Quality Shipping
customer_reviews.text: Although the Surface Pro 7 is in the market, I opted to purchase the Surface Pro 6. I felt that the prior model had better quality overall for what I needed. I was able to obtain this tablet for what I felt was a great price. Oh how I wish that Microsoft would include the pen as a standard item & possible reduction on the keyboard. I use this tablet in my home inspection business, great for this purpose. I received the tablet with no delay time at all, right to my doorstep, with great tracking information.
customer_reviews.author: A-Inspections

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop, poor battery life.
customer_reviews.text: The main reason I purchased this Surface is because of their claim of 13 to 13.5 hours battery life on one charge, so I don't have to carry a power cord. Unfortunately, it was a big disappointment with getting only about 6-8 hours on best days. The computer itself is functioning very well. I did trouble shoot the issue with Microsoft tech support and they couldn't come up with any issues. So, now I am back to my Apple MacBook Air, which last whole day over 12 hours on one charge. I'm very disappointed in Microsoft for blown up and misleading battery life advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: Amit Prayaga

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Loving this product. For optimal use, get yourself a pen and type cover to go with it. The only problem I'm having is sometimes it randomly disconnects from WiFi and can no longer find any networks even if I'm surrounded by a million networks. I just restart it and it starts to work again. Black color looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Rafa Barakat

customer_reviews.title: Best 2 in 1
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Super fast, quality construction, any viewing angle, super portable.
customer_reviews.author: Early Adopter

customer_reviews.text: One of the best, SP6 fit for my work and lifestyle too....hope it stays in the roadmap of msft👌
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery, great product, screen is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: The price was great and it's an excellent laptop tablet. I enjoy playing with it and I guess this is why my battery life is short. Already order a case for it as at this proce you wanna protect our device as best as possible. Shipping was quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug TT

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely frustrated and annoyed customer
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed, upset and frustrated at this time. The fact that after 5 attempts at troubleshooting, installing a new operating system and more than hours of long distance calls I am no closer to having the issue with this device resolved than I was the first time I contacted Amazon to report this issue.
